Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 刂 indicates the sound; 荅 (answer) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 荅 [ dā ] to answer; small bean; thick, heavy
    • 刂 [ dāo ] knife
①钩，镰刀。

剳字的基本解释

剳
dá
钩，镰刀。

剳
zhá
古同“札”。

剳字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhā］
［《廣韻》竹洽切，入洽，知。］
亦作“剳1”。亦作“箚1”。
(1)扎；刺。
(2)驻扎。
(3)站立。
(4)见“劄客”。
(5)见“劄地”。
[②]［zhá］
［《洪武正韻》竹洽切，入合］
亦作“剳2”。亦作“箚2”。
(1)书写。
(2)旧时的一种公文。
(3)眨。参见“劄2眼”。

剳字的康熙字典解释

【子集下】【刀字部】　剳； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页142第36
【集韻】德合切，音答。鉤也。【玉篇】剳?也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhā］
["Guangyun" Bamboo Qia cuts, enters Qia, knows. ]
Also known as "剳1". Also known as "箚1".
(1) Puncture; thorn.
(2) Stationed.
(3) Standing.
(4) See "Zake".
(5) See "Zhadi".
[②]［zhá］
["Hongwu Zhengyun" Bamboo Qiaqi, Into the Combination]
Also known as "剳2". Also known as "箚2".
(1) Writing.
(2) An old official document.
(3) Blink. See "Zha 2 eyes".
